scripts.build: yarn && sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/mqtt.js && sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/bin/pub.js&& sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/bin/sub.js&& next build
scripts.now-build: yarn && sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/mqtt.js && sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/bin/pub.js&& sed -i "s/\('use strict'\)\|\(#\!\/usr\/bin\/env node\)//g" node_modules/mqtt/bin/sub.js&& next build
